Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.system

Class DownloadManager

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.system.DownloadManager
public class DownloadManager extends Object
Manages Download actions and interactions, which handles CRUD and IO for Sentinel. This includes deleting files, getting/setting files, filenames, or file extensions, monitoring downloads, verifying file has been downloaded, parsing PDF content for content verification, and more.

    • isFileDownloaded

      public static boolean isFileDownloaded(String fileName)
      Returns true if the file exists in the download directory.
      Parameters:
      fileName - String the name of the file for which to look.
      Returns:
      boolean Returns true if the file exists, false if it does not.

    • monitorDownload

      public static String monitorDownload() throws InterruptedException, IOException
      Monitors the current set download directory and returns a filename once the file is downloaded.
      Returns:
      String The name of the file that was downloaded.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the file download is interrupted
      IOException - if the file cannot be created.

    • monitorDownload

      public static String monitorDownload(Runnable pageAction) throws InterruptedException, IOException
      Monitors the current set download directory, performs some action, and returns a filename once the file is downloaded.
      Parameters:
      pageAction - Runnable the action to perform after starting the monitoring of the download directory. This could be a click, or other step.
      Returns:
      String The name of the file that was downloaded.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the file download is interrupted
      IOException - if the file cannot be created.

    • monitorDownload

      public static String monitorDownload(String downloadDir, String fileExtension, Runnable pageAction) throws InterruptedException, IOException
      Returns the name of a downloaded file by monitoring the given download directory and looking for a file to be downloaded with the given file extension. It checks the given directory every 1/10th of a second under the file download is complete, and then returns the name of the file downloaded. If the download takes longer than 20 seconds, the function times out and throws an error.
      Parameters:
      downloadDir - String path to the download directory.
      fileExtension - String extension of the file type you are expecting to be downloaded.
      Returns:
      String The name of the file that was downloaded.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during download
      IOException - if the file cannot be created.

    • verifyTextInFile

      public static boolean verifyTextInFile(File textFile, String expectedText, String encoding) throws IOException
      Returns true if the given file contains the given text. Reads the file with the given text encoding.
      Parameters:
      textFile - File the file to check the text of.
      expectedText - String the text to search for.
      encoding - String encoding of the text file. Standard is "UTF-8", or maybe "ASCII"
      Returns:
      boolean true if the file contains the text. false otherise
      Throws:
      IOException - in the case that the file does not exist, cannot be read, or another generic IO exception

    • verifyTextInFile

      public static boolean verifyTextInFile(String expectedText) throws IOException
      Returns true if the most recently-downloaded file contains the given text. Reads the file with UTF-8 encoding.
      Parameters:
      expectedText - String the text to search for.
      Returns:
      boolean true if the file contains the text. false otherise
      Throws:
      IOException - in the case that the file does not exist, cannot be read, or another generic IO exception

    • verifyPDFContent

      public static boolean verifyPDFContent(URL url, String expectedText, int pageNumber) throws IOException
      Returns true if the given text appears on a particular page of the passed PDF that is opened in a new tab, without needing to download it. It takes the URL of the PDF which can be done by using PageManager.getCurrentUrl() if the PDF is the active window. It also takes a string of the text you expect to find, and the page number you expect to find it on.
      Parameters:
      url - String URL of the PDF
      expectedText - String Text to be checked in the PDF.
      pageNumber - int Number of the page on the pdf to look for the text.
      Returns:
      boolean true if the text was found, false if it was not.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there was an error in finding or opening the PDF

    • verifyPDFContent

      public static boolean verifyPDFContent(URL url, String expectedText, int pageStart, int pageEnd) throws IOException
      Returns true if the given text exists within a particular page range of the passed PDF. This PDF is opened in a new tab, without needing to download it. It takes the URL of the PDF which can be done by using PageManager.getCurrentUrl() if the PDF is the active window. It also takes a string of the text you expect to find, and the page range you expect to find it on. The page range is inclusive, meaning it will search the two page numbers you pass it and every number in between. To search just one page, pass the same number twice, or use the overloaded method that only takes one int parameter.
      Parameters:
      url - String strURL URL of the PDF
      expectedText - String Text to be checked in the PDF.
      pageStart - int Number of the page on the pdf to start looking for the text (inclusive).
      pageEnd - int Number of the page on the pdf to stop looking for the text (inclusive).
      Returns:
      boolean true if the text was found, false if it was not.
      Throws:
      IOException - if error while opening, stripping, loading, parsing, or closing PDF

    • verifyTextInDownloadedPDF

      public static boolean verifyTextInDownloadedPDF(String expectedText, File pdfFile, int pageStart, int pageEnd)
      Returns true if the given text exists in the given PDF within a specified page range.
      Parameters:
      expectedText - String Text to be checked in the PDF.
      pdfFile - File A File handler to the file
      pageStart - int Number of the page on the pdf to start looking for the text (inclusive).
      pageEnd - int Number of the page on the pdf to stop looking for the text (inclusive).
      Returns:
      boolean true if the text was found, false if it was not.

    • verifyDownloadedPDFViaVisualRendering

      public static boolean verifyDownloadedPDFViaVisualRendering(File expectedPdf, File newPdf, double percentAllowedDifferencePerPage, String resultFilePath) throws de.redsix.pdfcompare.RenderingException, IOException
      Verifies the content of the two files, specified by the given paths, have the same content based on a graphical pixel-to-pixel comparison. The given percent of allowed difference per page is applied during the comparison, to allow for some expected variance. The default is 0.0 for an exact match. The resulting file, with differences highlighted, is written to the given path.
      Parameters:
      expectedPdf - File the file containing the reference PDF.
      newPdf - File the PDF file to compare to the reference PDF.
      percentAllowedDifferencePerPage - double the percent of allowed difference per page.
      resultFilePath - String the file path to write the result PDF to.
      Returns:
      boolean true if the PDFs match, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException
      de.redsix.pdfcompare.RenderingException

    • verifyDownloadedPDFViaVisualRendering

      public static boolean verifyDownloadedPDFViaVisualRendering(File expectedPdf, File newPdf) throws de.redsix.pdfcompare.RenderingException, IOException
      Verifies the content of the two files, specified by the given paths, have the EXACT same content based on a graphical pixel-to-pixel comparison.
      Parameters:
      expectedPdf - File the file containing the reference PDF.
      newPdf - File the PDF file to compare to the reference PDF.
      Returns:
      boolean true if the PDFs match exactly, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException
      de.redsix.pdfcompare.RenderingException

    • saveImageInPDF

      public static String saveImageInPDF(int index, String pdfFileName) throws IOException
      Returns the path of an image containing the entire contents of the PDF page given.
      NOTE: The PDF is assumed to be in the downloads directory.
      Parameters:
      index - int page index of the page to be rendered
      pdfFileName - String the name of the pdf containing image
      Returns:
      String the location of the saved image file
      Throws:
      IOException - if error during file IO or during document load
